training.description: **Light in the Dark:** Increase your Hope Slots by +1

feature.title: Creature Comfort
feature.description: Once per short rest, when you take time during a quiet moment to give your companion love and attention, you may both clear a Stress or take Hope.

feature.title: Armored
feature.description: Your armor score increases by +2 when your companion is in melee.

training.description: **Vicious:** Increase your companion's damage dice (**d6** to **d8**, etc.) or range (**melee** to **very close**, etc.)

feature.title: Bonded
feature.description: When you mark your last Hit Point, your Companion rushes to your side to comfort you. Roll a number of **d6** equal to the available stress slots they have and mark them. On a 6, they get you up. Clear your last Hit Point and return to the scene.
